package.description: assistive_teleop is a package developed to provide an easily accessible interface for control of a PR2 by persons with severe motor disabilities using an assistive HCI device to provide control of mouse movement and a single (left) click. This is a direct product of the Robots for Humanity effort, a collaboration between Willow Garage and the Healthcare Robotics Lab at Georgia Tech (www.healthcare-robotics.com).
package.author: Phillip M. Grice
